post.author: 임기순
post.content:
Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today and am happy to hear that things are working out at TD. As I mentioned I will be specializing in the Java Development space and would love to be a resource for you or anyone you believe may benefit from my services. Currently we have a role with the Dominion of Canada on the go and we must present by Thursday Feb. 17th.
Thank you again for your time
Best regards Lazar Mile
Lazar Mile Technical Recruiter 150 York Street, Suite 1206, Toronto, Ontario, M5H 3S5 877.342.5004 T 416.342.5046 F 416.342.5070
post.title: Dominion of Canada - Java
